H0.text: Which was the first US state to secede from the Union in December 1860; the first action of the Civil War took place in that state in April the following year. US-MS

H1.text: Which was the first US state to secede from the Union in December 1860; the first action of the Civil War took place in that state in April the following year. US-GA

H2.text: Which was the first US state to secede from the Union in December 1860; the first action of the Civil War took place in that state in April the following year. US-AL

H3.text: Which was the first US state to secede from the Union in December 1860; the first action of the Civil War took place in that state in April the following year. US-SC

A4.text: South Carolina was the first state to secede from the Union in December 1860

A5.text: The bombardment of the beleaguered U.S. garrison at Fort Sumter in Charleston Harbor on April 12, 1861, is generally recognized as the first military engagement of the war
